# Load Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(cowplot)
library(class)
library(caret)
library(e1071)
library(stringr)
```


# Load in the data
```{r}
data = read.csv(file.choose(), header=T)
```


# Look at the data
```{r}
str(data)
head(data)

#Looking for relationships
ggplot(data, aes(x=Age, y=DailyRate, color=Attrition)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_jitter() +
  geom_smooth() +
  ggtitle("Relationship Between ABV vs IBU")

```
